item.title: Oil Gains on Heightened Geopolitical Risks, Supply Concerns
item.description: Oil futures were higher in European trade, on signs of tightness in the market and growing geopolitical concerns and despite a stronger dollar.

item.title: Sterling Expected to Weaken Versus Dollar on Risk of Early BOE Rate Cut
item.description: Citi Research expects sterling to weaken against the dollar—which it favors broadly against other G10 currencies—due to the prospect the BOE could cut interest rates earlier than previously expected.

item.title: Singapore Inflation Quickened Unexpectedly in February
item.description: Inflation accelerated unexpectedly in Singapore as prices in key categories like food picked up, backing views that any potential monetary easing is still some time away.

item.title: Kingfisher Shares Hit by Cautious Outlook
item.description: Kingfisher shares fell after it reported above-forecast profits for fiscal 2024 but announced weaker guidance for next year due to more conservative assumptions about demand.

item.title: China Evergrande Drops Debt Restructuring Applications in U.S.
item.description: The developer had sought a New York court’s approval last August to restructure more than $19 billion in offshore debt via Chapter 15 bankruptcy filings.

item.title: MTN Backs Midterm Views Despite Uncertain Outlook
item.description: MTN confirmed its medium-term targets despite a sharp drop in 2023 earnings and warning that elevated volatility increased headwinds and added material uncertainty to its outlook.

item.title: Nissan Motor Plans to Sell More Than a Dozen New EV Models by 2026
item.description: The Japanese carmaker plans to start selling more than a dozen new electric-vehicle models, aiming to boost total car sales by one million units within three years.

item.title: Quality Bonds Seen Offering Attractive Risk-Reward
item.description: UBS Global Wealth Management continues to see an attractive risk-reward outlook for quality bonds, including government and investment grade corporate bonds.

item.title: Baidu Shares Rise After Reports of Apple Collaboration
item.description: Shares of Baidu rose sharply in Hong Kong after reports of possible collaboration involving artificial intelligence between the Chinese tech giant and smartphone giant Apple.

item.title: Sirens Sound, Anxieties Rise on Tiny Island Near North Korean Shores
item.description: Residents on Yeonpyeong, just below the maritime border, fear the Kim Jong Un regime could launch another attack.

item.title: Demand has been sliding for Jack Daniel's Old No. 7 and the company behind it, Brown-Forman, forecasts a sluggish U.S. whiskey business for at least the next year.
item.description: Demand has been sliding for Jack Daniel’s Old No. 7 and the company behind it, Brown-Forman, forecasts a sluggish U.S. whiskey business for at least the next year.

item.title: The surge in U.S. home prices has drawn small investors into the market, where they are buying houses with the intention of selling them quickly for a profit.
item.description: The surge in U.S. home prices has drawn small investors into the market, where they are buying houses with the intention of selling them quickly for a profit.

item.title: The explosive growth of U.S. Treasurysissuance troubles some investors who remember past instability in rapidly expanding markets and are considering the potential effect ofnew trading rules.
item.description: The explosive growth of U.S. Treasurys issuance troubles some investors who remember past instability in rapidly expanding markets and are considering the potential effect of new trading rules.

item.title: Finance chiefs are grappling with the complex math of balancing investments in generative AI with potential profits that are hard to gauge by traditional measures.
item.description: Finance chiefs are grappling with the complex math of balancing investments in generative AI with potential profits that are hard to gauge by traditional measures.

item.title: Tech companies anticipating the enormous quantities of electricity that will be needed to power the advance of artificial intelligence are looking to utilities for reassurance about supplies.
item.description: Tech companies anticipating the enormous quantities of electricity that will be needed to power the advance of artificial intelligence are looking to utilities for reassurance about supplies.

item.title: As Russia mourned the more than 130 people killed in a terrorist attack, the assault threatened to undermine Putin's strongman image and raised questions about Moscow's ability to deliver on its promise of security for the Russian people.
item.description: As Russia mourned the more than 130 people killed in a terrorist attack, the assault threatened to undermine Putin’s strongman image and raised questions about Moscow’s ability to deliver on its promise of security for the Russian people.

item.title: Died: Peter Angelos, 94, Baltimore Orioles owner.
item.description: Died: Peter Angelos, 94, Baltimore Orioles owner.

item.title: Government's failure to find a lasting solution to immigration enforcement at the southern U.S. border has led to a chaotic status quo that threatens a range of domestic goals.
item.description: Government’s failure to find a lasting solution to immigration enforcement at the southern U.S. border has led to a chaotic status quo that threatens a range of domestic goals.

item.title: Having ridden the New York commercial-property boom together, NYCB and Meridian Capital are now in a changed world of higher interest rates and falling building valuations.
item.description: Having ridden the New York commercial-property boom together, NYCB and Meridian Capital are now in a changed world of higher interest rates and falling building valuations.

item.title: The Supreme Court will consider whether to roll back the availability of the abortion pill known as mifepristone as women increasingly rely on medication to end unwanted pregnancies.
item.description: The Supreme Court will consider whether to roll back the availability of the abortion pill known as mifepristone as women increasingly rely on medication to end unwanted pregnancies.
